StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateCollegeDegreeTypeUsingGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode uniqueiden..er, @FiscalYear int, @DegreeCode varchar(2), @UserLogin varchar(50)
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @SchoolCodeint int
Select @SchoolCodeint = School_Code FROM High_School hs where hs.rowguid = @SchoolCode
INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeAvailableDegree] ([SCHOOL_CODE],[FISCAL_YEAR],[DEGREE_CODE], [User_Login] ,[Update_Date])
VALUES (@SchoolCodeint, @FiscalYear,@DegreeCode, @UserLogin, GetDate()) --- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
